typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> harishfilenametest
harishfilenametest sink(input(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['harishoutputtest.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
